attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop using our money to pay for the bail out plans such as bank shares going down the pan and put in place a committee and should be elected from the general public. They should be able to control what the money is going to be spent on e.g. any new buildings for “bail out plans” why should people like me and others pay for other peoples problems

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
